Reference

MS ACCESS Database Export

Functions for exporting MS ACCESS DB into csv files or saving both (DB and csv files) into one ZIP file

create_zipfile()

Create Zip File with MS ACCESS Database And Exported CSV files

dump_access_db()

Dump MS ACCESS Database To Csv Files

Import Database Content

Function to import exported database content from .csv files into list in order to create vignette “database_content.Rmd” (for checking database content)

import_database_content()

Import Database Content From CSV Files

Helper Functions

Functions for defining default directories

default_access_db()

Default Path to MS ACCESS Database

default_csv_dir()

Helper Function: Default Csv Directory

default_target_dir()

Helper Function: Default Target Directory
